item.title: Picking A Language (Java)| Selenium webdriver Java
item.description: Selenium Java Programming Language This post (Picking A Language) is part of a series about Selenium WebDriver with Java . In order to work well with Selenium you need to choose a programming language to write your automated acceptance tests in.
